001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.navigation.DistanceUnit;
004
005public interface IDistanceSensor {
006    default double getDistance() {
007        return getDistance(getUnit());
008    }
009
010    double getDistance(DistanceUnit unit);
011
012    IDistanceSensor onUnit(DistanceUnit distanceUnit);
013
014    DistanceUnit getUnit();
015}
